content: this jaunty hat creates a literal feather in your cap to wear around town you ll feel pride in your creation and joy from the compliments that are sure to come in it s a clever way to bring an old idiom to life with your hands and hook **skill** crochet **difficulty** intermediate **sizes** adult small medium large shown in adult medium size **finished measurements** brim circumference 16½ 18 21 length 8 8¾ 9 **materials** rico design essentials soft merino aran 100% superwash merino wool 50g/109 yds 001 mustard 2 balls all sizes hook us size g/6 4 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle removable stitch markers **gauge** 16 sts x 12 row = 4 in half_double_crochet save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this hat is crocheted in joined turned rounds from the bottom up all shaping occurs after the motif is complete you will use removable stitch markers to mark the first and last stitch of the feathermotif it is also recommended that you place a removable stitch marker on the first stitch of the round to mark the beginning of round and move it up with each new round during shaping rounds you will place removable stitch markers in each decrease and move them up each round
